link.title: Emperor - Of Blindness And Subsequent Seers - 가사

Walking behind me

The gift of better sight

Built one more brick
Fearing again
To choose the wrong step

Vaguely I remember
The blurred eyes
Of someone small
These strangers often come as blind
A troubled mind
I left behind

Yet, was it I
Of my shadow
Walking in the past
